instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3437: What is 820-3437? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>
threads.message:
Hi all I have <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> was dead no power liquid damage all seems to be working, however the fan spins for a few sec then stop then start spinning again then the machine turns on.
any advise please

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>
threads.message:
This machine restarts 2 times and stays on at third; is the normal way to start.
But this should happen only first time whern you connect the charger.
If battery is good, next time must start in one step, like 2015 model.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3437</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>
threads.message: Thank you so much for your help ?
